summary.para: The WINHTTP_REQUEST_TIMES structure contains a variety of timing information for a request.

remarks.para: This structure is used with to retrieve timing information for a request by specifying the WINHTTP_OPTION_REQUEST_TIMES flag.

summary.para: Unsigned long integer value that contains the number of timings to retrieve. This should generally be set to WinHttpRequestTimeLast.
Array of unsigned long long integer values that will contain the returned timings, indexed by .
Times are measured as performance counter values; for more information, see .
